DOC.brief_summary: The purpose noncomparative study obtain preliminary estimate efficacy erlotinib standard chemotherapy patient advance , previously untreated nonsmall cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status ( PS ) 2 . The study also evaluate safety single-agent erlotinib patient population .
